short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the default new tab with a more minimalstic one

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your default new tab with this one to get an easy to use and nice looking default new tab replacment with a lot of options for customization
